sense.def:
To represent someone
pomeni nastopati v imenu nekoga, na primer na sodišču ali v parlamentu.

seg.quote: Thirty one nations are now represented at the Disarmament Conference.

sense.def:
Kadar znamenje ali simbol
represents something
, nam pomeni tisto stvar.

seg.quote: The word ‘love’ was represented by a small heart.

sense.def:
To represent something in a particular way
pomeni opisati nekaj na določen način.

seg.quote: The evacuation of our forces was represented as a triumphant success.
